docs.lead_paragraph: Michelle Obama's anti-childhood obesity initiative is getting a new leader.

headline.main: New Executive Director Named for First Lady's Initiative

headline.main: Nestlé Sells Spanish Frozen Foods Brand to Findus Group

docs.abstract: The deal to sell the La Cocinera brand is the latest in a series of sales by Nestlé as it reduces its brand offerings to focus on more profitable business lines.
docs.snippet: The deal to sell the La Cocinera brand is the latest in a series of sales by Nestlé as it reduces its brand offerings to focus on more profitable business lines.

docs.lead_paragraph: For years, the government has told Americans to eat their vegetables. A rewrite of the government's dietary guidelines could include some new advice, too, on sugar, salt, meat and caffeine.

headline.main: 5 Things to Look For as Govt Writes New Dietary Advice
headline.print_headline: 5 Things to Look For as Govt Writes New Dietary Advice

docs.snippet: For years, the government has told Americans to eat their vegetables. A rewrite of the government's dietary guidelines could include some new advice, too, on sugar, salt, meat and caffeine.
